entries.title: Six dead after bus falls from bridge in Spain
entries.description: Rescuers have recovered the bodies of those who died after a bus fell from a bridge and crashed into a river on Christmas Eve, according to Spanish authorities.

entries.title: Paris shooting suspect 'tells investigators of hatred of foreigners'
entries.description: The man suspected of shooting dead three Kurds in Paris this week has told investigators of his "hatred of foreigners", prosecutors say.

entries.title: Ten people believed to be buried in huge Austrian avalanche
entries.description: About 10 people are feared to have been buried by an avalanche in western Austria, local media has reported.

entries.title: Seven British-linked people arrested in Iran over anti-government protests
entries.description: Seven people with links to the UK have been arrested by Iran's Revolutionary Guard after anti-government protests in the country, state media says.

entries.title: Life on the road amid monster winter storm in New York
entries.description: Careering, squealing and with arms windmilling, a little girl in Minnie Mouse pyjamas flew past the lobby elevator on bright white roller skates with pink glittery wheels.

entries.title: How Ukrainians are doing Christmas differently this year
entries.description: Combat medic Myroslav Mardarevych is hunched over a desk in the foyer of St Sophia Cathedral in central Kyiv.

entries.title: Foreign aid groups in Afghanistan suspend work after Taliban ban on women workers
entries.description: Several groups providing aid in Afghanistan have suspended their operations, after the Taliban ruled women could no longer work for non-governmental organisations with immediate effect.

entries.title: Pele's family spending Christmas in hospital after football legend's cancer progressed
entries.description: Pele's family are spending Christmas Day in hospital after the Brazilian football legend's cancer progressed.
